titleStmt.title: A discourse, betvveene Vpright the shoomaker and Master Pattent, the smith Both meeting on the horse exchange in Smithfield, on the 20. day of Aprill 1639. Ne sutor vltra crepidam. By T.J.
titleStmt.author: T. J., fl. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop, and T. F[awcet] for Francis Groves dwelling on Snow-Hill neare the Sarazens Head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
